## ProgramBuilder.fma() method

Same as fma builtin function in WGSL, only valid for WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
fma(x: number | PBShaderExp, y: number | PBShaderExp, z: number | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

|  y | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  z | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
